name: whobmonopoly
description: whoBmonopoly â€” Cloudflare Workers edition of the classic board game.

scripts.db:setup: npm run db:core && npm run db:ui
scripts.rdb:setup: npm run rdb:core && npm run rdb:ui
scripts.rdb:reset:core: wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --remote --file db/schema/drop-core.sql && wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --remote --file db/schema/core.sql
scripts.rdb:reset:ui: wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/drop-ui.sql && wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/ui.sql
scripts.rdb:reset: npm run rdb:reset:core && npm run rdb:reset:ui
scripts.db:setup:local: wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --local --file db/schema/core.sql && wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --local --file db/schema/ui.sql
